response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,000,000 to you, offering significant advantages over competitors on the market. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000, providing you with substantial savings and an opportunity to maximize your investment. Please let us know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 950000}
